_comment: Shared translations used across the application

banner.title: Cookie Preferences
banner.description: We use cookies to enhance your experience while respecting your privacy. Choose which cookies you'd like to allow.

details.title: Cookie Preferences
details.description: Manage your cookie preferences for a personalized experience.

necessary.title: Necessary
necessary.description: Essential cookies required for the website to function properly.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.description: Help us understand how you use our website to improve your experience.
analytics.privacyNote: All data is anonymized and never sold to third parties

marketing.title: Marketing
marketing.description: Used to show you relevant advertisements and measure their effectiveness.

preferences.title: Preferences
preferences.description: Remember your choices and settings for a better experience.

analytics.label: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us improve our services by collecting anonymous usage data

marketing.label: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: Allow personalized advertisements based on your interests

privacyControlPanel.you_are_in_complete_control_of_2: You are in complete control of how your data is processed and stored.
privacyControlPanel.choose_how_new_documents_are_h_5: Choose how new documents are handled by default.
privacyControlPanel.for_your_peace_of_mind_you_can_7: For your peace of mind, you can set documents to be automatically deleted after a period of inactivity.
privacyControlPanel.get_alerts_for_expiring_docume_13: Get alerts for expiring documents and insurance policies.
privacyControlPanel.granular_access_controls_for_e_14: Granular access controls for each family member (coming soon).

localProcessing.title: Local Processing
localProcessing.description: Your data is processed entirely on your device

cloudProcessing.title: Cloud Processing
cloudProcessing.description: Your data is processed using AI assistance

securityStatus.your_trust_is_our_highest_prio_2: Your trust is our highest priority. We use enterprise-grade security to keep your family's information safe.
securityStatus.all_security_features_are_acti_5: All security features are active and protecting your family's information.

explanations.endToEndEncryption: Your data is scrambled into an unreadable code from the moment it leaves your device until you view it again.
explanations.secureCloudStorage: Your encrypted data is stored in world-class, physically secure data centers.
explanations.localOnlyPrivacyMode: When you use Local-Only Mode, your sensitive documents are never sent to our servers.
explanations.multiFactorAuthentication: Requires both your password and a code from your phone to log in.
explanations.europeanDataCenters: All your data is stored exclusively in secure European data centers with strict privacy laws.
explanations.zeroKnowledgeArchitecture: We've designed our system so we can't see your data, even if we wanted to.

analogies.endToEndEncryption: It's like sending a letter in a locked box that only you have the key to open.
analogies.secureCloudStorage: It's like keeping your locked box inside a bank vault with 24/7 guards.
analogies.localOnlyPrivacyMode: It's like writing your most private notes in a diary that never leaves your house.
analogies.multiFactorAuthentication: It's like needing both a key and a secret handshake to get into a private club.
analogies.europeanDataCenters: It's like choosing to store your valuables in a country known for its strong privacy protection.
analogies.zeroKnowledgeArchitecture: It's like having a safety deposit box where even the bank manager doesn't have the key.

familyBenefits.endToEndEncryption: Ensures that no one—not even us—can read your personal information.
familyBenefits.secureCloudStorage: Protects your plan from being lost to fire, theft, or computer failure.
familyBenefits.localOnlyPrivacyMode: Gives you absolute certainty that your most private documents remain in your control.
familyBenefits.multiFactorAuthentication: Prevents anyone from accessing your account, even if they steal your password.
familyBenefits.europeanDataCenters: Your family's data is protected by some of the world's strongest privacy regulations.
familyBenefits.zeroKnowledgeArchitecture: Your family's secrets remain secrets, protected from everyone including us.

errors.alreadyProcessed: To vabilo je bilo že obdelano

messages.accepted: Hvala. Vaša vloga skrbnika je bila potrjena.
messages.declined: Zavrnili ste vlogo. Pošiljatelj bo obveščen.

notFound.title: Vabilo ni najdeno
notFound.description: Ta povezava za vabilo je neveljavna ali je potekla.

inviteAcceptance.subtitle: Povabljeni ste bili, da postanete skrbnik njihove digitalne zapuščine na LegacyGuardu.

whatThisMeans.title: Kaj to pomeni
whatThisMeans.point1: Imeli boste varen dostop do njihovih pomembnih dokumentov in informacij
whatThisMeans.point2: Informacije lahko samo pregledujete - brez možnosti urejanja ali brisanja
whatThisMeans.point3: Vaš dostop je namenjen za nujne primere ali ko je potrebna pomoč
whatThisMeans.point4: Ves dostop je zabeležen in varen

inviteAcceptance.disclaimer: S sprejemom te vloge priznavate odgovornost, da ste zaupanja vreden skrbnik njihove digitalne zapuščine.

invite.title: {{name}} vas je povabil, da postanete skrbnik njegove/njene digitalne zapuščine
